pullrequest.title: [Blueprint] Add support for moving and rotating models

content.raw: The issue happens to every component that is created on demand. I can reproduce the issue with the `diff_drive` world, which creates the `JointVelocityCmd` component, even on the `entity_tree` branch. It's not clear to me yet why components created on demand are having issues, but components created on the server since startup are fine even if the GUI doesn't use them. I'm debugging with my branch.
content.html: The issue happens to every component that is created on demand. I can reproduce the issue with the diff_drive world, which creates the JointVelocityCmd component, even on the entity_tree branch. It's not clear to me yet why components created on demand are having issues, but components created on the server since startup are fine even if the GUI doesn't use them. I'm debugging with my branch.
